entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Duncan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Cowichan 2:00 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: 0.8°C
Wind: NNW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia this afternoon. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 13 February 2023
